Exile the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Until the end of your next turn, you may play the exiled cards.
Bloodborn 6–{R}{G} [i]({R}{G}: Exile this from your graveyard with six gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
